title: Jumping spider
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| jumping spider s [![Jumping spider.png](/images/0/0f/Jumping_spider.png)](/File:Jumping_spider.png) |                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                      | 21-43                                                                                  |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                          | 8                                                                                      |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                      | 301                                                                                    |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                             | 15                                                                                     |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                  | 6                                                                                      |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                            | 12                                                                                     |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                      | 20                                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                             | 20 ([pounce](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [ensnare](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour")) |
| Attack2                                                                                             | 8 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))      |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                             | None                                                                                   |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                   | [Poison](/Poison "Poison")                                                             |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                       | Land                                                                                   |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                        | [Animal](/Category:Animal_intelligence "Category:Animal intelligence")                 |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                    | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                         |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                    | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                      |

| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                | spider, jumping spider                                                                 |

|   |                                                                                                                                                |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A spider which weaves webs between its front legs and leaps at its prey, ensnaring them. The speed with which it leaps is almost supernatural. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Jumping spiders** are small, non-poisonous spiders that attack in a unique way; they can quickly "jump" ([blink](/Blink "Blink")) into melee range with you, and their bite attacks have a 50% chance to ensnare you as though you'd just walked into a [web](/Web "Web") [trap](/Trap "Trap"). This can leave you defenseless for several turns while the jumping spider and anything else around tears you to pieces. They can be found in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest") and near its entrance in [Lair](/Lair "Lair").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                           |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Blink Close](/Blink_Close "Blink Close") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Blink Away](/Blink_Away "Blink Away")    | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- You can escape webs by [blinking](/Blink "Blink") or [teleporting](/Teleport "Teleport") away.
- When facing groups of various kinds of spiders in the Spider's Nest, prioritizing targets can be tricky. Jumping spiders can cover a lot of distance in a very short time and can disable you with very lethal consequences, so try to target them first if possible. Even severe poisoning can be remedied with a single [potion of curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") after all.
- [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") is not inhibited by being entangled, so consider nuking everything around you before spending several turns struggling to escape.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), jumping spiders will have [Blink Range](/Blink_Range "Blink Range") instead of [Blink Away](/Blink_Away "Blink Away").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), they were [medium-sized](/Size "Size") monsters.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), jumping spiders had a light [poisonous](/Poison "Poison") attack.
- Prior to [0.11](/0.11 "0.11"), jumping spiders did not have an ensnaring melee attack.
html:
Jumping spider

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

jumping spider s 
HP 21-43
HD 8
XP 301
Speed 15
AC 6
EV 12
Will 20
Attack1 20 (pounce: ensnare)
Attack2 8 (bite: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type spider, jumping spider
Flags No skeleton
Web immune
A spider which weaves webs between its front legs and leaps at its prey, ensnaring them. The speed with which it leaps is almost supernatural.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Jumping spiders are small, non-poisonous spiders that attack in a unique way; they can quickly "jump" (blink) into melee range with you, and their bite attacks have a 50% chance to ensnare you as though you'd just walked into a web trap. This can leave you defenseless for several turns while the jumping spider and anything else around tears you to pieces. They can be found in the Spider's Nest and near its entrance in Lair.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Blink Close Natural flag
Slot2 Blink Away Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • You can escape webs by blinking or teleporting away.
  • When facing groups of various kinds of spiders in the Spider's Nest, prioritizing targets can be tricky. Jumping spiders can cover a lot of distance in a very short time and can disable you with very lethal consequences, so try to target them first if possible. Even severe poisoning can be remedied with a single potion of curing after all.
  • Spellcasting is not inhibited by being entangled, so consider nuking everything around you before spending several turns struggling to escape.

History

  • In 0.32, jumping spiders will have Blink Range instead of Blink Away.
  • Prior to 0.19, they were medium-sized monsters.
  • Prior to 0.16, jumping spiders had a light poisonous attack.
  • Prior to 0.11, jumping spiders did not have an ensnaring melee attack.
